vocabularyDefinition.en: The relationship between employers and employees that arises in the case of paid work after the conclusion of an employment contract.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: An account number that is linked to the employment relationship. The person's wages are paid into this account number.

vocabularyDefinition.en: Period for which an agreement has been concluded in an employment contract. A contract period has a start date, and in some cases an end date. That is the date of termination of employment.

vocabularyDefinition.en: The relationship between employers and employees that arises in the case of paid work after the conclusion of an employment contract.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: The relationship between employers and employees that arises in the case of paid work after the conclusion of an employment contract.

vocabularyDefinition.en: An end-of-year bonus is a financial bonus that a person receives from his/her employer at the end of the year. Social security contributions and taxes have to be paid on it.

applicationProfileUsageNote.en: This concerns the sums for work performed, paid absences, allowances, premiums, etc.

vocabularyDefinition.en: This is an annual allowance that an employee receives to cover the additional cost of vacation.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: This is an annual allowance that an employee receives to cover the additional cost of vacation.

vocabularyDefinition.en: A meal voucher is a fringe benefit that an employee receives from his/her employer. It is a contribution from the employer towards the employee's costs for meals.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: A meal voucher is a fringe benefit that an employee receives from his/her employer. It is a contribution from the employer towards the employee's costs for meals.

applicationProfileUsageNote.en: Reimbursement of expenses, travel expenses, etc.

vocabularyDefinition.en: The net salary is the gross salary from which the social security contribution and withholding tax are deducted.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: The net salary is the gross salary from which the social security contribution and withholding tax are deducted.

vocabularyDefinition.en: A taxable meal voucher is a meal voucher with an amount above the legal ceiling for tax-free meal vouchers. They are mentioned separately on the payslip.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: A taxable meal voucher is a meal voucher with an amount above the legal ceiling for tax-free meal vouchers. They are mentioned separately on the payslip.

vocabularyDefinition.en: Place where a person resides.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: Place where a person resides.

vocabularyDefinition.en: Advance on the final income tax.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: Advance on the final income tax.

vocabularyUsageNote.en: The amount of withholding tax is determined by wage level, marital status, family situation, etc. The withholding tax is deducted from the total taxable salary.

applicationProfileUsageNote.en: The amount of withholding tax is determined by wage level, marital status, family situation, etc. The withholding tax is deducted from the total taxable salary.

vocabularyDefinition.en: The average number of hours per week in which the employee is expected to work based on his contract, divided by the average number of hours per week in which a model person is expected to work.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: The average number of hours per week in which the employee is expected to work based on his contract, divided by the average number of hours per week in which a model person is expected to work.

vocabularyDefinition.en: The relationship between employers and employees that arises in the case of paid work after the conclusion of an employment contract.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: The relationship between employers and employees that arises in the case of paid work after the conclusion of an employment contract.

vocabularyDefinition.en: Full-time or part-time.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: Full-time or part-time.

vocabularyDefinition.en: An account number that is linked to the employment relationship. The person's wages are paid into this account number.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: An account number that is linked to the employment relationship. The person's wages are paid into this account number.

vocabularyDefinition.en: Period for which an agreement has been concluded in an employment contract. A contract period has a start date, and in some cases an end date. That is the date of termination of employment.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: Period for which an agreement has been concluded in an employment contract. A contract period has a start date, and in some cases an end date. That is the date of termination of employment.

vocabularyUsageNote.en: If the date of termination of employment is not mentioned, it is implicitly assumed that it does not exist.

applicationProfileUsageNote.en: If the date of termination of employment is not mentioned, it is implicitly assumed that it does not exist.

vocabularyDefinition.en: The person who the employee is in the employment relationship.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: The person who the employee is in the employment relationship.

vocabularyDefinition.en: The organization that is the employer in the employment relationship.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: The organization that is the employer in the employment relationship.

vocabularyDefinition.en: The average number of hours per week in which the employee is expected to work based on his contract, divided by the average number of hours per week in which a model person is expected to work.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: The average number of hours per week in which the employee is expected to work based on his contract, divided by the average number of hours per week in which a model person is expected to work.

vocabularyDefinition.en: The amount that a person receives for services rendered in an employment context. It can be a financial amount, an amount in kind, compensation, etc.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: The amount that a person receives for services rendered in an employment context. It can be a financial amount, an amount in kind, compensation, etc.

vocabularyDefinition.en: Employee, civil servant, student, etc.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: Employee, civil servant, student, etc.

vocabularyDefinition.en: The amount a person receives for services rendered, goods made available, country or assets.

vocabularyDefinition.en: A check contains a certain sum of money. E.g. Eco Vouchers

vocabularyDefinition.en: In collective debt settlement, a repayment plan is drawn up for the payment of debts to the creditors. A person's wages are deposited and distributed according to the established arrangement.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: In collective debt settlement, a repayment plan is drawn up for the payment of debts to the creditors. A person's wages are deposited and distributed according to the established arrangement.

vocabularyDefinition.en: A vehicle that is made available to the employee by the employer, as part of the salary package.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: A vehicle that is made available to the employee by the employer, as part of the salary package.

vocabularyDefinition.en: Mandatory deductions by the employer.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: Mandatory deductions by the employer.

vocabularyDefinition.en: The relationship between employers and employees that arises in the case of paid work after the conclusion of an employment contract.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: The relationship between employers and employees that arises in the case of paid work after the conclusion of an employment contract.

vocabularyDefinition.en: An end-of-year bonus is a financial bonus that a person receives from his/her employer at the end of the year. Social security contributions and taxes have to be paid on it.

applicationProfileDefinition.en: An end-of-year bonus is a financial bonus that a person receives from his/her employer at the end of the year. Social security contributions and taxes have to be paid on it.

vocabularyDefinition.en: The sum of all wage elements for social security and tax deductions.

vocabularyDefinition.en: This is an annual allowance that an employee receives to cover the additional cost of vacation.

vocabularyDefinition.en: A meal voucher is a fringe benefit that an employee receives from his/her employer. It is a contribution from the employer towards the employee's costs for meals.

vocabularyDefinition.en: The actual wages paid into the person's account.

vocabularyDefinition.en: Refers to the difference between a one-off payment and a periodic payment.
